SELECT cami.merchant_name,cami.mechanism,cami.status,cami.merchant_id,cami.credentials_no,COUNT(sl.user_name) AS operNum,COUNT(DISTINCT su.user_id) AS userNum,COUNT(DISTINCT sl.user_name) AS operUserNum FROM sys_user AS su LEFT JOIN sys_logininfor AS sl ON sl.user_name=su.user_name AND access_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} LEFT JOIN c_agr_merchant_info cami ON su.merchant_id=cami.merchant_id

GROUP BY cami.merchant_name,cami.mechanism,cami.status,cami.merchant_id,cami.credentials_no
